ShortDescription.Value: Reversed variants of vanilla roads and highways

Publish.LongDescription:
# Vanilla Roads Reversed This is a collection of the same old vanilla roads, but reversed. By reversed, it means you can Left Hand Drive (LHD/RHT) roads on a Right Hand Drive (RHD/LHT).
As of version 1.0, there are 27 reversed roads along with 2 bonus roads. ### Highways (Bonus) * Highway Twoway - 6 lanes * Highway Twoway - 8 lanes ### Highways Reversed * Highway Twoway - 2 lanes * Highway Twoway - 3 lanes * Highway Twoway - 4 lanes * Highway Twoway - 6 lanes * Highway Twoway - 8 lanes * Truss Arch Bridge - Highway Twoway - 2 Lanes ### Large Roads Reversed * Cable-stayed Bridge - XL Road Divided - 8 Lanes * Extradosed Bridge - Large Road Divided - 6 Lanes * Large Road * Large Road Asymmetric * Large Road Divided * XL Road Divided ### Medium Road Reversed * Golden Gate Bridge * Golden Gate Road * Grand Bridge * Medium Road * Medium Road Asymmetric * Medium Road Divided * Tied Arch Bridge - 4 lanes ### Small Roads Reversed * Alley * Double Public Transport Lane * Gravel Road * Pedestrian Street * Small Road * Small Road Asymmetric * Truss Arch Bridge - Small Road - 2 Lanes * Wooden Covered Bridge - 2 lanes
### **Asset Icon Library** is required for the icons to be displayed. Have ideas? Find me on Discord.
# DISCLAIMER * Safe to remove. This mod will not break your save if removed. * This mod may require ***Asset Packs Manager*** which is highly experimental. This mod shouldn't break the save game. But subscribing to assets that require this without the dependency will pop up errors. Worst case you'll get error popups on game load and/or grey boxes in save. But either way, YOU ARE RESPONSIBLE for any damage. Contact me on Discord and I'll try to help you recover anyway.
